Tunable.name: DISTANCE_TO_RECHECK_INUSE
Tunable.description: Distance at which a Sim will start checking their LoS and in use on the object they're routing to and cancel if it's taken.

Tunable.name: DISTANCE_TO_RECHECK_STAND_RESERVATION
Tunable.description: Distance at which a Sim will stop if there are still other Sims standing in the way.
